mapper.select: SELECT send.MSGID, send.SCHTYPE, send.SUBJECT, send.DEPARTNUM, send.NOWDATE, send.SENDDATE, send.MSGCNT, send.MSGCONTENT, dest.DESTNM, dest.DESTNUM from UMS_MSG_SEND send, UMS_DEST dest where send.msgid=dest.msgid and send.msgid=#{msg_id}
